author: Reuters Editorial
title: Former Fed chief Bernanke sees bad year, no quick recovery
description: The U.S. economy could shrink 30% or more this quarter as stay-at-home orders aimed at slowing the coronavirus outbreak choke off business, and it could be a couple years before the economy regains its footing, former Federal Reserve Chair Ben Bernanke said o…
